function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High density urban area (Nagoya City) may contribute to increased risk of contagious diseases due to close proximity and high population density.","Impact":"Potential for rapid spread of contagious diseases due to close proximity and high population density.","Mitigation":"Implement strict public health measures, increase access to healthcare, and promote vaccination programs to mitigate the impact of contagious diseases.","Technologies":"Surveillance technology for early detection, public health information systems, and telemedicine for remote healthcare access.","People":"Residents in the high-density urban area and surrounding areas, healthcare workers, and visitors to the area.","Owner":"Local government, healthcare organizations, and urban planning authorities."},{"Description":"Use of green areas may affect the spread of contagious diseases, especially if crowded or frequented by a large number of people.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in crowded green areas, leading to potential outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Limit the number of visitors to green areas, promote social distancing, and provide guidance on proper hygiene practices in outdoor settings.","Technologies":"Smart park management systems for visitor control, contactless payment systems, and mobile apps for monitoring crowd density.","People":"Visitors to green areas, park authorities, and local residents near green spaces.","Owner":"Park management organizations, local government, and public health authorities."}]}
